body_html: @apaszke Maybe I'm misunderstanding something, but I thought that the plan we agreed on last week was that we would port the optimizer to work on ATen ops rather than ONNX ops, so the vagaries of the ONNX representation would no longer be relevant.

body: @apaszke Maybe I'm misunderstanding something, but I thought that the plan we agreed on last week was that we would port the optimizer to work on ATen ops rather than ONNX ops, so the vagaries of the ONNX representation would no longer be relevant.
